text: tatha unake nabee ne kahaah allaah ne taaloot ko tumhaara raaja bana diya hai. ve kahane lageh taaloot hamaara raaja kaise ho sakata hai? ham usase adhik raajy ka adhikaar rakhate hain, vah to bada dhanee bhee nahin hai. (nabee ne) kahaah allaah ne use tumapar nirvaachit kiya hai aur use adhik gyaan tatha shaareerik bal pradaan kiya hai aur allaah jise chaahe, apana raajy pradaan kare tatha allaah hee vishaal, ati gyaanee[1] hai
